price: Àti pé dájúdájú tí A bá fẹ́ ni, A ìbá kúkú gba ìmísí tí A fi ránṣẹ́ sí ọ (kúrò ní ọ̀dọ̀ rẹ). Lẹ́yìn náà, ìwọ kò níí rí aláàbò kan tí ó máa là ọ́ lọ́dọ̀ Wa.
arabic: وَلَئِن شِئۡنَا لَنَذۡهَبَنَّ بِٱلَّذِيٓ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ ثُمَّ لَا تَجِدُ لَكَ بِهِۦ عَلَيۡنَا وَكِيلًا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wala-in shi'nā lanadhhabanna bi-alladhī awḥaynā ilayka thumma lā tajidu laka bihi ʿalaynā wakīlan
